title: Deal Targeting
description: Targeting parameters for a deal. All fields are optional. Omitting this object or specific fields implies targeting all available inventory for those dimensions.

geo.description: Geographic targeting. Values can encode countries, regions, cities, postal codes, or metro codes. Omitting implies target all geographies.

devices.description: Device types to target. Omitting implies target all devices.

allow_lists.description: Included domain or app list IDs in the ad decisioning platform. Omitting implies allow everything.

block_lists.description: Excluded domain or app list IDs in the ad decisioning platform

include_segments.description: Included segment IDs in the ad decisioning platform. Can reference signal IDs from the Signals Protocol.

exclude_segments.description: Excluded segment IDs in the ad decisioning platform
